attributes.action: Actually READ each petition on this site...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make it compulsary for Tony Blair to sit down and actually READ each petition on this site.  They represent the views of the people who voted him into his 'lofty' position of power in the first place.  We, the general public, would appear to have become 'superfluous to requirements' under his Government. 
The website is undoubtedly a good idea, but totally pointless if it is just another empty gesture from this seemingly 'untouchable' leader.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
